8432643c-93f2-44ca-b8fd-8434fa150034.description: Earners of the Space Professional Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics across a wide breadth of fundamental topics including Orbits, Launch, Propulsion, Spacecraft Systems & Space Weather. Badge earners were challenged across all fundamental areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 22+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
8432643c-93f2-44ca-b8fd-8434fa150034.name: Space Professional Course

badge_template_activities.title: Space Professional Course, the first in a series of courses designed to set the new standard for baseline knowledge, communication, and professional development within the Space Industry. Students are required to complete asynchronous elearning challenges and modules. Time to complete is estimated at over 22 hours of learning time.

ee9ceb9a-c3cc-4f52-881e-f2805477c23d.description: Earners of the Space Mission Areas and Capabilities Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Remote Sensing, PNT, Environmental Monitoring, Commercial, and Military Applications of Space. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
ee9ceb9a-c3cc-4f52-881e-f2805477c23d.name: Space Mission Areas and Capabilities Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will learn about the many ways in which humanity uses space to our benefit. Topics covered in this course include Remote sensing, PNT, Environmental Monitoring, Satellite Communications, Scientific Research, Commercial uses of space and Military uses of space. Having an understanding of the capabilities in the space industry will make you a more articulate and confident contributor to the space industry.

75c89063-6a81-4fab-96a5-b78e4ddaa05f.description: Earners of the Deep Space Observation Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Remote Sensing, Optic Design and Orbits. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 30 minutes of asynchronous learning experiences.
75c89063-6a81-4fab-96a5-b78e4ddaa05f.name: Deep Space Observation Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will be introduced to the concepts and some technology behind deep space observation missions and the difference between these sensors and Earth observing sensors. With exciting innovations like the James Webb Space Telescope that are revolutionizing the way in which we observe our universe, the topic of deep space observation is at the forefront of many academic and scientific organizations.

1b9f9538-63e9-476b-be27-795f3be13a1f.description: Earners of the GEO Servicing Satellite Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to the GEO Servicing industry to include propulsion methods, proximity operations, and satellite design. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 30 minutes of asynchronous learning experiences.
1b9f9538-63e9-476b-be27-795f3be13a1f.name: GEO Servicing Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will learn how companies are revolutionizing the way in which space logistics are being employed to support the space ecosystem. With this technology, companies are now able to prolong the operational lifespans of their satellites on orbit as well as design new systems that are capable of remaining in orbit far longer than systems of the past. Understanding this emerging space service sector will give you a unique insight into a growing sections of the space industry.

78212481-f9a0-4187-a2f2-c0a8d147ed22.description: Earners of the Introduction to Orbits Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Orbital Parameters, Classical Orbital Elements, Orbital Regimes, and the Physics that govern spaceflight. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
78212481-f9a0-4187-a2f2-c0a8d147ed22.name: Introduction to Orbits

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will learn the basics behind the physics of how objects are placed into orbits and what causes them to remain in orbit. You will also learn about the various orbital regimes that are commonly used by spacecraft. With this knowledge, you will be able to communicate effectively on a variety of teams across the space industry.

38a16bce-3d5d-40aa-84bc-2ff3a0233eb0.description: Earners of the Space Tourism Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Orbits, Human Spaceflight and Space Tourism. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 30 minutes of asynchronous learning experiences.
38a16bce-3d5d-40aa-84bc-2ff3a0233eb0.name: Intro to Space Tourism Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will get an introduction to the field of space tourism and some of the challenges associated with sending tourists to space. Companies like Blue Origin, SpaceX and Virgin are all at the cutting edge of space tourism. Take this course to learn about a potentially revolutionary sector of the future space industry!

853dbc09-cd11-4f11-b0bc-7a05a8df374b.description: Earners of the LEO Communications Systems Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Communications Theory, Orbit Design, and Satellite Communications . Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 30 minutes of asynchronous learning experiences.
853dbc09-cd11-4f11-b0bc-7a05a8df374b.name: LEO Communications Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will be introduced to concepts regarding communications satellites in Low Earth Orbit. You will learn about factors that must be taken into consideration when designing a communications satellite system in LEO, different providers of satellite communications in LEO, and how communications systems in LEO differ from traditional communications satellites in GEO. Understanding these concepts will allow you to more effectively navigate the growing sector of LEO SATCOM.

6e16b3a5-23a7-48f4-b083-62130d97d6c2.description: Earners of the Rocket Science and Space Launch Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Launch, Propulsion, Rocket Design and Rocket Selection Considerations. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
6e16b3a5-23a7-48f4-b083-62130d97d6c2.name: Rocket Science and Launch

badge_template_activities.title: his course will teach you the fundamentals behind how we deliver objects to space. Understanding these concepts are crucial to understanding other fields of expertise across the space industry. For example, by realizing that a customer’s initial requirements will require an extremely large satellite payload, you will be able to effectively communicate early in the design process that the customer can expect high launch costs due to the anticipated satellite size. This course will also give you a

2caa00c0-c5f9-4218-9239-c5ac7d9061ca.description: Earners of the Space Environment and EMR Theory Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to the Space Environment, Space Weather, the Sun’s Structure, the Solar Contributions to the Space Environment, Electromagnetic Radiation Theory, Electromagnetic Wave Characteristics, and Spacecraft Design Considerations. Earners were challenged with rigorous tasks designed to simulate industry performances. Mastery was obtained during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning
2caa00c0-c5f9-4218-9239-c5ac7d9061ca.name: Space Environment and EMR Theory

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will learn about the hostile environment of space and why it is such a difficult and complex task to design a spacecraft that can survive in such an environment. You will also learn about the characteristics of Electromagnetic waves and how they interact with matter, a concept that will help you better understand how the electromagnetic spectrum can be used to observe or collect data on a wide range of subjects.

d0a9d3e5-711a-4115-ac58-e159bc1bd694.description: Earners of the On-orbit Manufacturing Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Human Spaceflight, Orbits, Launch Operations and Space System Design. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 30 minutes of asynchronous learning experiences.
d0a9d3e5-711a-4115-ac58-e159bc1bd694.name: Space Hotel: On-Orbit Manufacturing Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will be introduced to concepts behind on-orbit manufacturing and some of the challenges associated with operating a hotel in space. Taking this course will give you a better appreciation and understanding of the immense logistical challenges associated with prolonged human spaceflight.

e29430fb-f250-4478-873d-0ae6edee02eb.description: Earners of the Space Systems Engineering Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Spacecraft Systems, Spacecraft Design Process, Spacecraft Subsystems, and Spacecraft Payload Options. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
e29430fb-f250-4478-873d-0ae6edee02eb.name: Space Systems Engineering

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will learn about the satellite design process as well as the various systems and subsystems that you will typically find on a spacecraft. In this course, you will learn how changes involving one subsystem can impact other subsystems on a spacecraft. Knowing these tradespaces will enable you to be a valuable, contributing member on a variety of teams in the space industry.

4cd224a8-7424-4cd7-b552-8b038dd3e9ab.description: Earners of the Basic PNT Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to PNT, satellite design, orbits, and satellite operations. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
4cd224a8-7424-4cd7-b552-8b038dd3e9ab.name: Basic PNT Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this course, you will be serving as a project manager that has been tasked with developing a GPS augmentation space system to provide improved signal in the Northern polar region. You will work with your various team members to make decisions regarding orbit design, bus options, and satellite operations to ensure that the customer requirements are being met while learning how decisions in one area can affect other aspects of the project.

b901235a-3584-41ca-ae4d-85e21d9bb0d8.description: Earners of the Basic Remote Sensing Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Remote Sensing, Spacecraft Systems, Spacecraft Design Process, Launch Operations, and Space System Operations. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
b901235a-3584-41ca-ae4d-85e21d9bb0d8.name: Basic Remote Sensing Course

badge_template_activities.title: In the Basic Remote Sensing Course, you will experience the satellite design process for a remote sensing spacecraft. Starting with receiving and analyzing customer requirements, you will proceed throughout this interactive story as a member on various teams that are designing and making decisions regarding this remote sensing systems. You will make decisions regarding orbit design, payload design, satellite bus design, which launch vehicle to use and many others as you progress in the story.

5f36fbe9-9b47-4510-92d4-441b866d79de.description: Earners of the Basic Satellite Communications Course badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to satellite communications, satellite design, and satellite operations. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
5f36fbe9-9b47-4510-92d4-441b866d79de.name: Basic Satellite Communications Course

badge_template_activities.title: In this interactive journey, you will make decisions regarding payload design, orbit design, launch, and satellite operations to ensure that the satellite system meets your customer's satellite communications needs. Through making these decisions, you will gain insight into the tradespace involved with designing a space system. The knowledge gained from this course will give you a better understanding of the many factors that go into designing and operating a communications spacecraft.

188ae9b6-3511-4cc8-ac87-019b40cab59f.description: Earners of the Nova Space Foundations Bundle badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Orbits, Space Environment, EMR Theory, Space Systems Design, Launch and Propulsion and Space Mission Areas. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 15+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
188ae9b6-3511-4cc8-ac87-019b40cab59f.name: Nova Space Foundations Bundle

badge_template_activities.title: This course bundle includes the Space Environment and Electromagnetic Spectrum Course, the Introduction to Orbits Course, the Rocket Science and Space Launch Course, the Space Systems Engineering Course and the Space Mission Areas and Capabilities Course. Upon completion of the bundle, you will receive a Credly digital credential that you can add to your professional profile on social media or elsewhere.

14701028-50eb-4a7b-96de-7d35a0fdc014.description: Earners of the Interactive Story Bundle badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Remote Sensing, PNT, Satellite Communications, Space System Design, Launch Design and Orbits. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 12+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
14701028-50eb-4a7b-96de-7d35a0fdc014.name: Nova Space Interactive Story Bundle

badge_template_activities.title: This course bundle includes the Basic Remote Sensing Course, Basic Satellite Communications Course, and the Basic PNT Course. Upon completion of the bundle, you will receive a Credly digital credential that you can add to your professional profile on social media or elsewhere.

f96629a1-a956-4295-a82c-080d664c1059.description: Earners of the Nova Space Short Story Bundle badge have demonstrated mastery of space and astronautics topics related to Remote Sensing, SATCOM, Proximity Operations, Orbits, Human Spaceflight and Launch Operations. Badge earners were challenged across all these areas with rigorous tasks designed to simulate meaningful real life industry performances professionals need to excel in the space economy. Earner mastery was verified during 3+ hours of asynchronous learning experiences.
f96629a1-a956-4295-a82c-080d664c1059.name: Nova Space Short Story Bundle

badge_template_activities.title: This bundle includes the GEO Servicing Satellite, LEO Communications Systems, Deep Space Observation, Intro to Space Tourism, and the Space Hotel Short Courses. Upon completion of the bundle, you will receive a Credly digital credential that you can add to your professional profile on social media or elsewhere.
